text: hey it's angel so it's been a few months
since I did my last kitchen favorites
video my last one was back in December
and since then you guys have told me
that you love watching me play with
gadgets and doing product reviews so
since it's the month of June I thought
it would start with June kitchen
favorites so here are my five kitchen
favorites for this month
product one the great ginger tool by a
kitchen I cube and this is a really cool
all-in-one ginger grater peeler slicer
if you like ginger and you use a lot of
ginger and Asian cooking like I do this
is definitely a really helpful tool how
it works is that have many compartments
and the first one is the ginger peeler
so you just remove the top part and it
has this round shape at the top and it's
made from plastic and what you do is you
can use this and you just rub it against
the ginger skin like so and it removes
the ginger skin the next compartment is
a top here it has a removable piece and
underneath that is the ginger grater so
you can go ahead and just grate your
ginger below that it falls into this
neat little compartment and if you're
wondering its non-slip it has these
great plastic type things on both sides
so when you put it down on the table it
prevents it from slipping on the other
side is a slicer and again there is a
compartment on the other side to hold
your sliced ginger now as an added bonus
all of this is top rack dishwasher safe
so if you do a lot of cooking with
ginger like I do then check
it is lee ginger grader by Kitchen IQ
product number two is the cut-resistant
glove by a microplane and honestly i got
this for my grandmother because i
thought it would make her laugh and
because i wanted to make sure that her
hands were protected when she cooks
turnip cake because she makes a lot of
turnip cake and i kind of thought it'd
be fun to try out so let's try this out
together
and it's actually really comfortable
doesn't seem like a big deal to wear and
I'm going to try it with a knife I'm not
going to try and cut your hair because
this is cut resistant not cut proof that
it only seems like it would help if
you're cutting or creating something at
least you would have an extra layer of
protection so better safe than sorry
product number three is the egg cracker
or a topper as I like to call it and
this is a really cool product especially
if you like eating hard-boiled or
soft-boiled eggs like I do how this
works is that you take your precooked
hard-boiled or soft-boiled eggs put this
egg topper right on top then pull the
lever and let go the vibrations will
score the shelf leaving you with a
perfectly topped egg now the really cool
thing about this is that when you're
done eating your egg you'll have this
perfect empty egg shell honey
product for our chops and these help you
with your cutting boards I thought these
were really unique in that they come in
a set of four and they help your cutting
boards in two ways you want to put all
four corners on because of the material
it helps give your cutting board a
non-slip surface now I just put these on
my small cutting board you can
definitely use it for a larger and
thicker cutting board as well but I
wanted to show you the second way that
these are helpful let's say you're
cutting fruits and vegetables on one
side of your cutting board and you want
to cut something like onions but you
don't want to wash your cutting board
right then and there
all you have to do is just flip over
your cutting board and you have a new
cutting surface the chops help raise
your cutting boards with it giving you
an extra cutting surface to cut on
product five is the spiralizer and this
is a handheld spiralizer I know there
are many different types of sterilizers
out there but I don't do it that often
and I don't want to take up that much
kitchen space so I went with the
handheld and this works really well it's
got two sides one that does a smaller
noodle and another one that does a
little thicker one and all you do is you
just take your zucchini slowly rotate
and voila you'll have spiralized
zucchini noodles it also comes with an
attachment here it really helps to get
as much vegetable or zucchini as you can
out of that last piece and since these
noodles are a great healthy low-calorie
alternative this would be great
substitute in my Taiwanese cold noodle
with peanut sauce recipe so these are my
five kitchen favorite
for the month of June and if you like
some of these products I'll post links
to these in the video description and as
an added bonus I am doing eight surprise
giveaway for this giveaway one lucky
winner will receive two of my June
favorite products from this video the
first one is the ginger grader from
Kitchen IQ because I love cooking with
ginger and the second one are the chops
so you can raise your cutting boards so
if you want that in my giveaway make
sure you subscribe to my channel
and also post in the comments below and
let me know what's your favorite of my
June favorites all of this information
is in my video description so check that
out I hope you guys enjoyed this kitchen
favorites video don't forget to give me
a thumbs up if you like this type of
video and I will see you guys next time
bye
